title: Mayflower Bride
description: Abigail Paine is not looking forward to seeing a New World, especially with a taciturn father on the verge of being disfellowshipped by the body of believers sent to start a new colony there. A series of disasters turns her life upside down, leaving her alone on that perilous journey with only the friendship of a young family easing her dread of the coming future. Simon Townsend is excited about a future in the new land of America. Only wild stories of natives and his wifeâ€™s delicate condition threatens his peace. When disaster strikes and his wife dies, he is faced with a dilemma that it seems only Abigail Paine can rectify. Can the two work together to give his little daughter the family she has been deprived of?
author: Darlene Mindrup
